snippet: The body of a notorious Nazi commander, who orchestrated the killing of 335 Italian civilians seven decades ago, was moved to a military airport on Wednesday.
abstract: The body of a notorious Nazi commander, who orchestrated the killing of 335 Italian civilians seven decades ago, was moved to a military airport on Wednesday.

headline.main: Body of Nazi War Criminal Moved to Airport in Rome After Clashes

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
